The acid slammed into Soundwave's arm, beginning to melt away a bit of
the armor there, as Soundwave recoiled in pain. Rumble tripped over the
ninja star which headed his way, and fell to the ground face first.

Megatron turned towards Prowl, and opened fire with his fusion cannon
towards the Maximal leader. "Stay away Prowl, or I will kill you just
like I did your namesake."
